1.0.0a.changes:
- Support for different servers
- Support for multilingual strings
- Basic database connection

- setup
-- required to use bot on server
-- sets essential configuration options
-- backs up current configuration when run again

- config
-- lets users configure every part of the bot

- limits
-- lets users limit categories and commands
-- limits based on channels or roles
-- limits allow for white- and blacklist

1.1.0a.changes:
- New database system
-- Based on ORM
-- Automatically creates and upgrades database on startup

1.2.0a.changes:
- Docker
-- Docker compose
-- Integrated Postgres database
